roles.name: trainer
roles.description: It consumes the data and trains local model

roles.name: middle-aggregator-1
roles.description: It aggregates the updates from trainers

roles.name: middle-aggregator-2
roles.description: It aggregates the updates from trainers

roles.name: top-aggregator
roles.description: It aggregates the updates from middle-aggregator

roles.name: selector
roles.description: It registers trainers and inform middle-aggregator to selectively pick trainer

channels.name: param-channel-1
channels.description: Model update is sent from trainer to middle-aggregator and vice-versa

channels.name: param-channel-2
channels.description: Model update is sent from trainer-2 to middle-aggregator-2 and vice-versa

channels.name: mid-aggregate-1-selector-channel
channels.description: selector informs of trainers to go to

channels.name: mid-aggregate-2-selector-channel
channels.description: selector informs of trainers to go to

channels.name: global-channel-1
channels.description: Model update is sent from middle-aggregator to top-aggregator and vice-versa

channels.name: global-channel-2
channels.description: Model update is sent from middle-aggregator to top-aggregator and vice-versa
